entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as having a feeling about Hermione's intentions.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A student who is trying to buy a birthday present for Draco Malfoy.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: The person Hermione wants to get a birthday present for.

entities.name: borgin
entities.description: A shopkeeper who is suspicious of Hermione's intentions.

entities.name: galleons
entities.description: The currency being used to buy items in the story.

entities.name: skull
entities.description: An item Hermione is trying to buy from Borgin's shop.

relationships.description: Hermione mentions that Draco Malfoy is her friend, indicating a relationship between the two.
Harry has a feeling that Borgin knows what Hermione is up to, suggesting a relationship of suspicion between Harry and Borgin.
